casebody.data:
Marsha A. EARLY
v.
COUNTY OF DURHAM DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES. No. 524PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Lowell L. Siler, Deputy County Attorney, for County of Durham DSS. Patrice Walker, for Marsha A. Early.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 16th day of September 2005 by Respondent (DSS) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
